content: Most people only live for their image, that is why where some have a self, a starting point, most people have a void, because they are so busy projecting themselves as this or that, dedicating their lives to actualize a concept of what they should be like rather than to actualize their ever-growing potentiality as a human being.
author: Bruce Lee, John Little
source: Striking Thoughts: Bruce Lee's Wisdom for Daily Living
